document.full_text: brandon prust, a 6-foot-2 left wing that marc staal calls "one of the toughest teammates i've ever had," played his 72nd consecutive game of the season friday night when the rangers defeated the montreal canadiens.
document.title: prust ignites rangers in win over montreal
lines_and_colors: brandon prust, a 6-foot-2 left wing that marc staal calls "one of the toughest teammates i've ever had," played his 72nd consecutive game of the season friday night when the rangers defeated the montreal canadiens.
